entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
